section.title: Installing Network Time Protocol (NTP)
section.para: To keep all the services in sync across multiple machines, you need to install NTP, and if you do a multi-node configuration you will configure one server to be the reference server.
Set up the NTP server on your controller node so that it receives data by modifying the ntp.conf file and restarting the service. As root:
